column4: Ubuntu has wiped out my partitions, and the strange thing it it still can see all the partitions, but the other OS (Vista and LinuxMint LiveCD) cannot!!!
I am in the process of backing all my data from C:\ anbd D:\..
windows cannot see ext partitions natively
I am not sure if I agree with the 'Windows can't see extended partition natively' part, but it is unable to see its own Primary NTFS partitions too.
